title: Scorecard: 54.8% ❌
content:
Project scorecard generated.

## Overall Score: 54.8%
Production Ready: ❌ No

## Component Scores
- testing: 100%
- documentation: 100%
- completion: 96.5%
- uniqueness: 87.5%
- codebase: 80%
- alignment: 75.0%
- ci_cd: 50.0%
- performance: 40.0%
- security: 36.4%
- clarity: 20.0%
- dogfooding: 10.0%
- parallelizable: 0.0%

## Blockers
- Security controls incomplete

## Recommendations
- [critical] Security: Implement path boundary enforcement, rate limiting, and access control
- [high] CodeQL: Enable CodeQL workflow for automated security scanning
- [medium] Performance: Enable: mcp_connection_pooling, async_operations
- [medium] Dogfooding: Enable more self-maintenance: pre_commit_hook, pre_push_hook, post_merge_hook...
